item.title: Visualising Python and Google Trends
item.description:
Last month I shared some of the things I had learned while playing around with the Google Trends Python library, PyTrends.

While collecting the data using this method is super fun and efficient, it's only really the start of what you can do with Python. Once we have the data ‚Ä¶

item.title: An Introduction to Using Google Trends with Python
item.description:
Pytrends is the unofficial API for Google Trends that allows you to automate the process of downloading different reports from Google Trends and can be used within Python to collect data using the different methods available within the API.

Google Trends is a free resource created by Google that analyses ‚Ä¶
